attributes.action: Provide funding to Staffordshire County Council to reduce a £35 million deficit.
attributes.additional_details:
Here are just some of the proposed cuts:
•	School crossing patrols.
•	Review cost of children’s resident provision.
•	Review alternative autism funding. 
•	Review Victoria Centre of history grant. 
•	Removal non-statutory community transport.
•	Removal concessionary travel before 09.30.
•	Reduction in grants to voluntary community social enterprise.
•	Review Adult learning disability provisions to remove  
        preventive services.
•	Review remaining financial support for hate crime
attributes.background: Staffordshire County Council has reduced running costs by £240 million in 9 years.There is a forecast £35 million reduction that will see measures that will reduce the size of the County Council and its capacity to deliver for Staffordshire people.

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions in the name of an organisation.
